name: Endless Bit Defence
description:
An in-development base defense title, targeted primary for mobile devices. 

The game is a passion project that started as a way to pass an university course, but quickly had us all invested beyond just that.

Disclaimer: The title is in pre-alpha, it still uses placeholder assets some of which were not designed by our group:

Temporary enemy sprite: https://www.deviantart.com/goodlyay/art/Skull-Sprite-407179427Map tileset:https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-terrain-repackSound effects:https://freesound.org/

Authors:
Mateusz Adamczyk
Michał Macikowski
Krzysztof Razik
